mapper.sql: id, charge_money, reward_money, order_state, create_time, finish_time, customer_id, brand_id, shop_detail_id, charge_balance, reward_balance, total_balance, number_day_now, arrival_amount, end_amount, type, charge_setting_id
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS rechargeCount, SUM(charge_money) AS rechargeNum, SUM(reward_money) AS rechargeGaNum, ( SELECT SUM(charge_money) FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND type = 1 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND brand_id = #{brandId} ) AS rechargeWeChat, ( SELECT SUM(charge_money) FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND type = 0 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND brand_id = #{brandId} ) AS rechargePos, SUM(charge_money) - SUM(charge_balance) AS rechargeCsNum,
IF ( number_day_now > 0, SUM( reward_money - (number_day_now - 1) * arrival_amount + end_amount ), SUM( reward_money - reward_balance ) ) AS rechargeGaCsNum, SUM(charge_balance) AS rechargeSpNum, SUM(reward_balance) AS rechargeGaSpNum FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND brand_id = #{brandId} GROUP BY brand_id = #{brandId}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS shopCount, SUM(charge_money) AS shopNum, SUM(reward_money) AS shopGaNum, ( SELECT SUM(charge_money) FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND type = 1 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND shop_detail_id = #{shopId} ) AS shopWeChat, ( SELECT SUM(charge_money) FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND type = 0 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND shop_detail_id = #{shopId} ) AS shopPos, SUM(charge_money)-SUM(charge_balance) AS shopCsNum, IF ( number_day_now > 0, SUM( reward_money - (((number_day_now - 1) * arrival_amount) + end_amount + reward_balance) ), SUM( reward_money - reward_balance ) ) AS shopGaCsNum FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1 AND create_time>#{begin} AND create_time<#{end} AND shop_detail_id = #{shopId} GROUP BY shop_detail_id = #{shopId}

select tco.shop_detail_id shopDetailId, IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) redCount, IFNULL(SUM(tco.reward_money),0) redMoney, IFNULL((SUM((select COUNT(1) from ( select top.result_data from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and IF(td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.production_status in (2,3,4)) and top.payment_mode_id = 7 and top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY top.result_data ) r where r.result_data = tco.id))),0) useRedCount, IFNULL((SUM((select SUM(r.payValue) from ( select top.result_data, SUM(top.pay_value) payValue from tb_order td inner join tb_order_payment_item top on td.id = top.order_id where td.order_state in (2,10,11,12) and IF(td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.is_pos_pay = 1,td.production_status in (2,3,4)) and top.payment_mode_id = 7 and top.pay_time >= CONCAT(#{useBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and top.pay_time <= CONCAT(#{useEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY top.result_data ) r where r.result_data = tco.id))),0) useRedMoney from tb_charge_order tco where tco.order_state = 1 and tco.reward_money > 0 and tco.create_time >= CONCAT(#{grantBeginDate},' 00:00:00') and tco.create_time <= CONCAT(#{grantEndDate},' 23:59:59') GROUP BY tco.shop_detail_id

SELECT COUNT(1) historyChargeCount, SUM(charge_money) historyChargeMoney, SUM(reward_money) historyRewardMoney, SUM(charge_balance) historyChargeBalance, SUM(reward_balance) historyRewardBalance FROM tb_charge_order WHERE order_state = 1
